info.description:
The ClearBank® API is a REST based API that can be connected to in order to leverage ClearBank®’s products and banking services.

This ClearBank® Financial Institution API area in Swagger provides Financial Institutions with the required API endpoint information and message schema.

For the necessary information in order for Financial Institutions to successfully connect to ClearBank®’s API, refer to the Knowledge Centre.

All information is provided to you on a confidential basis and shall remain the property of ClearBank Ltd (including ownership rights in all intellectual property). All information is provided "as is" and without any implied warranty, representation, condition or otherwise, regarding its accuracy or completeness.

Copyright ClearBank Ltd. Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority (Financial Services Register number: 754568). Registered Address: Level 29, 30 St. Mary Axe, London, England EC3A 8EP.
info.title: ClearBank Financial Institutions API

post.summary: This endpoint is used to create a new business customer (Limited Company).

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API Token, obtained from the ClearBank Portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request; valid for 24 hours, max length 83.

requestBody.description: Information required to create business customer

firstName.description: The first name of the business director.

middleName.description: The middle name of the business director.

surname.description: The surname of the business director.

AddBusinessDirectorRequest.description: Request object for capturing required data for creating a Director for a Limited Company

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the UBO in date format, if it is an individual.

AddBusinessUboRequest.description: Request object capturing required data for creating a UBO (Ultimate Beneficiary Owner)

validFrom.description: The date from when the customer started using the current address in date-time format.

validTo.description: The expiry date of the customer’s current address in date-time format. Leave this field blank if the current address is still valid.

buildingNameNumber.description: The building name and/or number of the customer’s current address.

streetName.description: The street name of the customer’s current address.

city.description: The city/town of the customer’s current address.

county.description: The county of the customer’s current address.

postalCode.description: The post code of the customer’s current address.

AddressRequest.description: Request object for capturing required data for updating an address

email.description: The primary email address used by the business customer.

tradingName.description: The trading name of the business.

companyName.description: The company name of the business.

vatRegistrationNumber.description: The VAT registration number of the business.

BusinessCustomerUpdateRequest.description: Request object for capturing required data for updating a Business Customer

firstName.description: The first name of the business director.

middleName.description: The middle name of the business director.

surname.description: The surname of the business director.

BusinessDirectorUpdateRequest.description: Request object for capturing required data for updating a Business Director

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the UBO in date format, if it is an individual.

BusinessUboUpdateRequest.description: Request object capturing required data for updating a UBO (Ultimate Beneficiary Owner)

previousAddresses.description: Previous address(es) associated with the business customer.

email.description: The primary email address used by the business customer.

tradingName.description: The trading name of the business.

companyName.description: The name of company of the business.

companyNumber.description: The Companies House assigned company number.

vatRegistrationNumber.description: VAT registration number of the business.

CreateBusinessCustomerRequest.description: Request object capturing required data for the business customer (Limited Company)

previousAddresses.description: Previous address(es) associated with the retail customer.

firstName.description: The first name of the retail customer.

middleName.description: The middle name of the retail customer.

surname.description: The surname name of the retail customer.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the retail customer in date format.

email.description: The primary email address used by the retail customer.

idNumber.description: The identification number on the identification document provided by the retail customer. Optional unless information for other ID fields such as idCountryOfIssue, idType, and/or idExpiryDate is specified.

idExpiryDate.description: The expiry date of the identification document provided by the retail customer in date-time format. Optional unless information for other ID fields such as idCountryOfIssue, IdType and/or idNumber is specified.

CreateRetailCustomerRequest.description: Request object capturing required data for the retail customer

previousAddresses.description: Previous address(es) associated with the sole trader.

firstName.description: The first name of the sole trader.

middleName.description: The middle name of the sole trader.

surname.description: The surname name of the sole trader.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the sole trader in date format.

email.description: The primary email address used by the sole trader.

idNumber.description: The identification number on the identification document provided by the sole trader. Optional unless information for other ID fields such as idCountryOfIssue, idType, and/or idExpiryDate is specified.

idExpiryDate.description: The expiry date of the identification document provided by the sole trader in date-time format. Optional unless information for other ID fields such as idCountryOfIssue, IdType and/or idNumber is specified.

tradingName.description: The trading name of the sole trader.

vatRegistrationNumber.description: The VAT registration number of the sole trader.

CreateSoleTraderCustomerRequest.description: Request object capturing required data to create sole trader

id.description: Unique identifier for the created resource

CreatedResourceResponse.description: Response containing information about the created resource

IdType.description: Type of document used for identification

type.description: A URI reference [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type. This specification encourages that, when dereferenced, it provides human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML [W3C.REC-html5-20141028]). When this member is not present, its value is assumed to be "about:blank".

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see[RFC7231], Section 3.4).

status.description: The HTTP status code([RFC7231], Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

ProblemDetails.description: A machine-readable format for specifying errors in HTTP API responses based on https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807

firstName.description: The first name of the retail customer.

middleName.description: The middle name of the retail customer.

surname.description: The surname of the retail customer.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the retail customer in date format.

email.description: The primary email address used by the retail customer.

idNumber.description: The identification number on the identification document provided by the retail customer. Optional unless information for other ID fields such as idCountryOfIssue, idType, and/or idExpiryDate is specified.

idExpiryDate.description: The expiry date of the identification document provided by the retail customer in date-time format. Optional unless information for other ID fields such as idCountryOfIssue, IdType and/or idNumber is specified.

RetailCustomerUpdateRequest.description: Request object for capturing data required to update a retail customer

firstName.description: The first name of the sole trader.

idExpiryDate.description: The expiry date of the identification document provided by the sole trader in date-time format. Optional unless information for other ID fields such as idCountryOfIssue, IdType and/or idNumber is specified.

tradingName.description: The trading name of the sole trader.

vatRegistrationNumber.description: VAT registration number of the business.

SoleTraderUpdateRequest.description: Request object capturing required data for the sole traders

UboOwnershipType.description: UBO type of ownership (Individual or company ownership)

type.description: A URI reference [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type. This specification encourages that, when dereferenced, it provides human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML [W3C.REC-html5-20141028]). When this member is not present, its value is assumed to be "about:blank".

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see[RFC7231], Section 3.4).

status.description: The HTTP status code([RFC7231], Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

ValidationProblemDetails.description: A machine-readable format for specifying errors in HTTP API responses based on https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807
